{"id":890567539,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1675411145,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/890567539/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        if(numRows==1){\n            return s;\n        }\n        StringBuilder str = new StringBuilder();\n        int n = s.length();\n        int k = 2* (numRows -1);\n        for(int i=0;i<numRows;i++){\n            int index = i ;\n            while(index<n){\n                str.append(s.charAt(index));\n                if(i!=0 && i!=numRows-1){\n                    int k1 = k- (2*i);\n                    int k2 = index + k1;\n                    if(k2<n){\n                        str.append(s.charAt(k2));\n                    }\n                }\n                index = index + k;   \n            }\n        }\n        return str.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false}
